overview: Vitória, daughter of the Moon, flees home right after falling in love with her mother. Júlio, her brother, who on the other hand has an incestuous love for his sister, leaves the kingdom in order to find her and ends up in the garden of Beatriz, daughter of the Sun, who tells him that Mãe d'Ouro is the only one who can help him in his quest. Thus he enters the dark forest to continue his adventure.
title: The Burning Bush
